availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George A. Babbit (Oldham County, Kentucky, laborer and stone mason)

body.p: Oldham County, Kentucky, laborer and stone mason. Kentucky native. Son of George Babbit and Rebecca Ross Babbit. Resident in Oldham County in 1840. Household owned three enslaved persons in Oldham County in 1840. Resident in Oldham County in 1850. Laborer in Oldham County in 1860. Stone mason in Oldham County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Sixth Manuscript Census of the United States (1840), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Oldham County, p. 160.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Oldham County, Division 1, p. 149A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Oldham County, p. 898.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Oldham County, KY, July 1863, p. 426.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 10773.
